ai-tha-ap9:1.4_0: First I saw with the First
ai-tha-ap9:2.1_0: up to the root of the Awakening One.
ai-tha-ap9:2.3_0: surrounded by Buddhas, and leading the spiritual life,
ai-tha-ap9:3.1_0: all the gods belonging to the Tusita hosts;
ai-tha-ap9:3.3_0: this is the Buddha, who has arrived.
ai-tha-ap9:3.4_0: in thick of night he dispelled the dark.
ai-tha-ap9:4.1_0: For this last amongst those who work in the country
ai-tha-ap9:4.2_0: One should not consent to great generals,
ai-tha-ap9:4.4_0: in the teaching of the Buddha,
ai-tha-ap9:5.1_0: Having given to the gods of the Thirty-Three,
ai-tha-ap9:5.3_0: My mind is serene with a thought
ai-tha-ap9:5.4_0: they’re the first kind of gifts.
ai-tha-ap9:6.2_0: the supreme Teacher in the world
ai-tha-ap9:6.3_0: sat down on the couch of the gods.
ai-tha-ap9:8.1_0: They’ve come here after approaching here,
ai-tha-ap9:8.2_0: he who arise from me the alms-food:
ai-tha-ap9:8.3_0: I shall extol the darkness with you,
ai-tha-ap9:9.2_0: you’ll make the gods in the order of gods.
ai-tha-ap9:9.3_0: having given up all the gods,
ai-tha-ap9:10.1_0: After passing away from the world of the gods,
ai-tha-ap9:10.2_0: will go to a human state.
ai-tha-ap9:10.4_0: for that reason he will make the dust there.
ai-tha-ap9:11.2_0: But born into a family of family.
ai-tha-ap9:11.3_0: Gotama is the name of Gotama.
ai-tha-ap9:12.1_0: Having seen (that), I am in Timbaruka,
ai-tha-ap9:12.2_0: will go to a human state.
ai-tha-ap9:12.3_0: Having gone forth from the homeless life,
ai-tha-ap9:12.4_0: he will stay for six years,
ai-tha-ap9:13.2_0: the Buddha will speak the truth,
ai-tha-ap9:13.3_0: Koṇḍañña, the name of the Koṇḍañña,
ai-tha-ap9:14.1_0: if she goes forth out of her;
ai-tha-ap9:15.2_0: the Buddha in the world with its gods,
ai-tha-ap9:15.3_0: while the deer in the wilderness,
ai-tha-ap9:17.3_0: I’ve realized the six kinds of direct knowledge,
ai-tha-ap9:18.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Koṇḍañña.
ai-tha-ap9:19.1_0: for the very first winner Universal Monarchy.
